main event: A UFO was observed over Louisville, Kentucky, on 12 November 1954, which was later identified as an experimental balloon released by the General Mills Corporation.
interesting points: The object gleamed white initially, then changed color to yellow, red, and finally faded away,The sighting lasted for 3 hours,Multiple witnesses reported seeing the object at high altitude,It was confirmed that the object matched the characteristics of a high-altitude research balloon,Two balloons were launched from the University of Minnesota around the same time as the sighting.
